tswitem.name: Undying Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Undying Augment Resonator
An unattuned survivability augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will heal you for 5%/ 7%/ 9%/ 12,5%/ 15% of your maximum health when you activate this ability. This can only happen every 20 seconds.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 4 Attuned Robust Augment Resonators
  • 60 Pure dust
  • 60 Pure water
